explanation: The prevailing sentiment from live chat leans bearish, with multiple mentions of shorting BTC, warnings of potential sharp drops if trendline support fails, and suggestions to close scalp longs. There is also significant uncertainty with discussions of manipulation, consolidation, and possible bullish traps. Some participants suggest going long at lower levels, but the dominant actionable sentiment with 1-minute candlestick signals appears to be short/sell for the immediate term.
representative_opinions: Tjeerd Phaff: i short around 109 or break of trendline
Rodolfo: btc dominance has been consolidating all day and looking to go up now, any scalp longs should be closed, try and hold swing longs if you bought near the beginning of the move
Tjeerd Phaff: the moment that entity stops placing the orders to support price we could fall hard
Ryan Teng: I think it hit the bottom structure there and is gonna go up now
